languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Слабый шепоток{/d} пробегает по вашему сознанию — требуя, настаивая на жертве. Вы понимаете, что голоса, появившиеся в вашей голове после ранения клинком Кунрада, не утихли — напротив, их источник тугим узелком свернулся где-то в недрах вашего разума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Слабый шепоток пробегает по вашему сознанию — требуя, настаивая на жертве. Вы понимаете, что голоса, появившиеся в вашей голове после ранения клинком Кунрада, не утихли — напротив, их источник тугим узелком свернулся где-то в недрах вашего разума.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade did not go away — on the contrary, their source coiled itself into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Слабый шепоток{/d} пробегает по вашему сознанию — требуя, настаивая на жертве. Вы понимаете, что голоса, появившиеся в вашей голове после ранения клинком Кунрада, не утихли — напротив, их источник тугим узелком свернулся где-то в недрах вашего разума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A quiet whisper runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade never went away — on the contrary, their source coiled up into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}某个{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}低语声{/d}贯穿了你的意识。它坚持着，要求你进行献祭。维特威尔用刀割伤你之后，那些充斥在你脑海中的声音并没有消失。恰恰相反，那些声音的源头盘踞在你脑海深处的某个地方，打成了一个紧紧的死结。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade did not go away — on the contrary, their source coiled itself into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}某个低语声贯穿了你的意识。它坚持着，要求你进行献祭。维特威尔用刀割伤你之后，那些充斥在你脑海中的声音并没有消失。恰恰相反，那些声音的源头盘踞在你脑海深处的某个地方，打成了一个紧紧的死结。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}susurro{/d} atraviesa tu conciencia, insistiendo en el sacrificio, exigiéndolo. Las voces que empezaron a poblar tu cabeza cuando Voigtvir te hirió con su cuchillo no desaparecieron, sino que se asentaron en un rincón oscuro de las profundidades de tu mente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade did not go away — on the contrary, their source coiled itself into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un susurro atraviesa tu conciencia, insistiendo en el sacrificio, exigiéndolo. Las voces que empezaron a poblar tu cabeza cuando Voigtvir te hirió con su cuchillo no desaparecieron, sino que se asentaron en un rincón oscuro de las profundidades de tu mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}ささやき{/d}があなたの意識を駆け巡り、主張し、犠牲を要求する。ボイトヴィルがあなたに刃で傷を負わせてから、頭を満たした声は消えなかった。それどころか、その声の源は心の奥底にしっかりと根付いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade did not go away — on the contrary, their source coiled itself into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ささやきがあなたの意識を駆け巡り、主張し、犠牲を要求する。ボイドヴィルが刀でであなたに傷を負わせた後、あなたの頭を満たした声は消えなかった。それどころか、その声の源は心の奥底にしっかりと根付いた。{/n}
{n}{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}ささやき{/d}があなたの意識を駆け巡り、主張し、犠牲を要求する。ボイトヴィルがあなたに刃で傷を負わせてから、頭を満たした声は消えなかった。それどころか、その声の源は心の奥底にしっかりと根付いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}murmure{/d} insistant se fait entendre dans votre conscience, réclamant un sacrifice. Les voix qui ont empli votre tête après que Voigtvir vous a {mf|blessé|blessée} avec sa lame sont toujours là ; leur source s'est recroquevillée pour former une boule serrée au plus profond de votre esprit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade did not go away — on the contrary, their source coiled itself into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un murmure insistant se fait entendre dans votre conscience, réclamant un sacrifice. Les voix qui ont empli votre tête après que Voigtvir vous a {mf|blessé|blessée} avec sa lame sont toujours là ; leur source s'est recroquevillée pour former une boule serrée au plus profond de votre esprit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Flüstern{/d} durchzieht dein Bewusstsein, es insistiert, verlangt Opfer. Die Stimmen, die nach der Verwundung durch Voigtvir mit seiner Klinge deinen Kopf erfüllten, sind nicht weggegangen – im Gegenteil, ihre Quelle hat irgendwo in den Tiefen deines Geistes einen festen Knoten gebildet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade did not go away — on the contrary, their source coiled itself into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Flüstern durchzieht dein Bewusstsein, es insistiert, verlangt Opfer. Die Stimmen, die nach der Verwundung durch Voigtvir mit seiner Klinge deinen Kopf erfüllten, sind nicht weggegangen – im Gegenteil, ihre Quelle hat irgendwo in den Tiefen deines Geistes einen festen Knoten gebildet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şuurunda bir {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}fısıltı{/d} dolanıyor, ısrarla kurban talep ediyor. Voigtvir, seni bıçağıyla yaraladığında zihnini dolduran sesler kaybolmamış... Aksine, o seslerin kaynağı, zihninin derinliklerinde bir yere tutunup bir kördüğüm olmuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whisper{/d} runs through your consciousness, insisting, demanding sacrifice. The voices that filled your head after Voigtvir wounded you with his blade did not go away — on the contrary, their source coiled itself into a tight knot somewhere in the depths of your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şuurunda bir fısıltı dolanıyor, ısrarla kurban talep ediyor. Voigtvir, seni bıçağıyla yaraladığında zihnini dolduran sesler kaybolmamış... Aksine, o seslerin kaynağı zihninin derinliklerinde bir yere tutunup sımsıkı bir düğüm hâline gelmiş.{/n}
